noun.description: A native or inhabitant of Quebec, typically one who is French Canadian.
examples: a 57-year-old Quebecois with a bristling gray mustache and penetrating eyes
the company now employs some 30 Maine residents and 20 Quebecois

noun.description: The form of French spoken in Quebec.
examples: I speak Parisian French, rather than Quebecois

adjective.description: Relating to Quebec or the form of French spoken there.
